name: Zombie Shooting King
description:
Stay alive as long as you can from the onrushing zombies!

[Game Feature]
Enjoy FPS game with simple control.
Various weapons are provided to help you survive.
Collect Survivor Cards and create unique abilities.
Supports Multi Player Mode.
Supports 16 languages.
Supports Achievement Board and Leaderboard.
Game can be played without internet connection.
